welcome_message_body: Welcome to Narashino, Japan! Known for its beautiful parks, rich history, and vibrant culture, we invite you to explore and enjoy everything this charming city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Haneda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal of Haneda Airport, mainly serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The dedicated terminal for international flights at Haneda Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport with a simple registration process.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Narita International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Narita International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and smallest terminal at Narita International Airport, exclusively serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free Wi-Fi network for up to 3 hours.
